title: HERBAL REMEDIES FOR AUTOIMMUNE DISEASE
cleaned_text:
Immunity is the body's natural ability to fight against disease causing microorganisms and antigens. Immune system is a complex system that involves different body organs at different levels to protect the body against foreign invasion.

IMMUNITY CAN BE BROADLY CLASSIFIED INTO TWO DIFFERENT VARIETIES NAMELY:-

It is the transfer of readymade or pre-formed antibodies (cells that fight pathogens) from one individual to another. It may occur at the time of birth when specific antibodies are transferred from the mother to fetus. Short term immunization done in case of diseases like immunodeficiency diseases also are a type of passive immunity transfer

In this case, there is an active involvement of the cellular components (B-cells and T-cells) of the immune system of the body which are activated by pathogens and actively fight against them to support body's defense. Alternatively, vaccines also lead to the activation of these cells imparting active immunity in an artificial manner.

The immune system of our body is naturally designed to combat the invading foreign microorganisms and allergens. In a few rare cases, this immune system starts attacking its own body cells and tissues. This is known as an auto-immune response. As a result of this faulty immune response, many diseases occur.

The symptoms of auto–immune diseases vary according to the body part they attack. These diseases have a very broad spectrum ranging from multiple sclerosis to Type-1 Diabetes. While many auto-immune disorders are manageable, a few may turn life threatening. Proper management of auto-immune disorders largely depends on their early diagnosis. But, in most cases, these diseases have a silent onset and often remain hidden for a long time.

Ayurveda is an age old system of medicine. Ojas is the term given to the body's natural ability to fight diseases. It can be compared to the normal immune response of the body.

Ojas helps to maintain the physical as well as mental wellbeing of the body. It should be strengthened with appropriate diet and lifestyle for living a healthy and long life.
